extendedInfo.description: Love is in the air and we wish you a love filled Valentine's Day.We present you all an awesome live wallpaper to light up the Christmas feel this festive season...a collection of some fabulous Christmas wallpapers with falling snow flakes and light balls....Spice up your android phone with some of the coolest 3D like collection of HD snowy wallpapers. If you are looking for a app with coolest graphics and less battery consumption, this one is surely the best for every X-Mas.Features:1. Awesome wallpaper collection2. Fully Customizable3. Various images for the snow flakes4. Extremely user friendly5. Takes up very little battery juiceand ITS ABSOLUTELY FREE!! with every feature unlocked...Isn't this great guys?FYI: Snow fall change when you tap on the Home Screen!!Simple Guidelines:TO USE:Home -> Press Menu -> Select Wallpapers -> Select Live Wallpapers -> Select Christmas HD Live Wallpaper.Wish you all A Merry Christmas,May the Joys of the seasonFill your heart with goodwill and cheer.May the chimes of Christmas gloryAdd up more shine and spreadSmiles across the miles,To-day & In the New Year.Enjoy folks and spend the the upcoming month of love with your true love.Be it kids or adults everybody loves this awesome app. If you are looking for a app with coolest graphics, less battery consumption and free features, this is surely a Santa's treat.And the following comments proves it:"Nice wallpaper to get you in the seasonal spirit.""So many different backgrounds u can pik from.... Its so real looking... Thank u""Love these live wallpaper spectacular colors"All suggestions are invited.Remember we are HAPPY TO HELP! :)Again, have a great Valentine's Day.

reviews.title: Too many adds
reviews.comment: Sorry if its just me but I don\'t like apps that have adds popping up in the notification bar. Id prefer to pay a small amount instead. Installed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s ok
reviews.comment: Could be more & better papers. Not bad team!
reviews.author: Donna Hammonds

reviews.title: Ok, way cute.
reviews.comment: It\'s cute & works great for me.  It was free, so only can suggest more professional photographs choices for backgrounds.  But other than that, it brings the Christmas spirit to my phone!  MERRY CHRISTMAS EVERYONE!!!!!!
reviews.author: Gloria Howard

reviews.title: Nice pictures
reviews.comment: Almost perfect, but no enough animations
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Very nice.. I like it so much
reviews.author: ali wangi

reviews.title: Ads...nuff said
reviews.comment: I wanted a nice wallpaper...not invitations to a dating website or fake lotteries
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: So fake its just a picture with little lights flashing really stupid
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice background
reviews.comment: Beautiful background options but the \"snow\" falls WAY too fast! Would be nice to have an option to turn it off too, it\'s very distracting
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nay29
reviews.comment: I loved the app but the push ads.....a no no. Everything else is excellent.
reviews.author: Shernay Mohamed-Howard

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Very nice live wallpaper I had it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Christmas live wallpaper
reviews.comment: Crap! They will send all kinds of ad\'s to your phone. They say you can unsubscribe to that through airpush.. well I tried that and I still get many many ad\'s. I certainly do not recommend. Unless you like all kinds pf ad\'s on the top bar of your  phone..
reviews.author: Christina Gardner

reviews.title: The choice is yours.
reviews.comment: So far so good. I like the idea that there are different wallpapers to choose from in 1 app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great :-)
reviews.comment: I love it, praise God. What\'s next.... ^_^
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ads and poor quality
reviews.comment: This wallpaper comes with a lot of unwanted ads and is not HD quality! Uninstalling now!
reviews.author: Anthony Shull

reviews.title: ADDS!!!
reviews.comment: The wall paper is beautiful...but it has totally clogged my phone with \"Airpush adds\"....which I can\'t figure out how to stop.   The directions are ridiculous and don\'t work!   Your wall paper is not worth the hassle!
reviews.author: Leann Svarverud

reviews.title: happy christmas
reviews.comment: lovely!!!!
reviews.author: Claire Leynes

reviews.title: Merry Xmas
reviews.comment: Love it
reviews.author: Angelica Bravo

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Awesome
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pop ups
reviews.comment: Pop ups all the time, even ween you havent it installaties as Your wallpaper
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Love it
reviews.author: Beammie Ji
